title: How to solve packet loss??
body: I figured out my lag problem was packet loss.. how do i solve this?

replies.body: Then why is lol the only game with this amount of packet loss, why isn't in more consistent, why does it only affect some and not others even when playing in the same house, and why does it not affect all of my accounts?

So basically this is what happens with packet loss: the connection carrying the game data coming to our servers loses part of the data it has. Those chunks of missing data are what cause all the lag spikes and such. Since this happens before it ever reaches our server, but it happens *after* it leaves your network, there's not a lot that either you or Riot can do. This means it's basically up to your ISP to either repair the damaged node causing the packet loss or send your connection in a better route.

Reach out to your ISP with the proof of packet loss and that should be enough for them to realize something is going wrong. Other than that, you can try using a VPN, but it won't be a permanent solution.
